events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because the product is not what I paid for.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund due to the request for returning an incorrect item and getting money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect product delivered.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can start processing your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached the photo showing the product I got which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order and send you a prepaid return label to send back the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the refund offer and the return label for the mistake.
The refund has been processed, and you should receive the amount back in your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund successfully and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks again for the help and quick resolution.
We are closing the case since the refund has been received and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
A customer satisfaction survey invitation has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience for this refund case.
